step.description: Happy path: Capture the current screen and verify that an image object is returned.
Happy path: Capture the current screen and verify that a Base64-encoded byte stream of the image is returned.

result.result: {"status": "success", "image_bytes": "...", "__truncation_alert__": "This JSON object has been intelligently truncated to save space. Lists may be shortened."}

step.description: Happy path: Capture the current screen and save it to a valid file path with a .png extension.
Edge case: Attempt to save the screenshot to a file with an unsupported extension and verify error handling.
Edge case: Attempt to save the screenshot to a non-existent directory and verify error handling.
Dependent call: Overwrite an existing file and ensure the tool can handle overwriting without errors.
